Step 1:
Insert into UPC_COMMON_ID_MAP2
 Select TGT.COMMON_ID, SRC.UPC, SRC.Retailer_code, SRC.ITEM_ID from
(SELECT
    FIELD_9 AS UPC,
    $Y AS RETAILER_CODE,
    FIELD_1 AS ITEM_ID
  FROM $X 
  WHERE FIELD_9 <> 'UPC' AND FIELD_9 IS NOT NULL AND FIELD_9 <> ' ' AND FIELD_9 REGEXP '^[0-9]+$'
  GROUP BY UPC, RETAILER_CODE
) SRC
JOIN UPC_COMMON_ID_MAP2 TGT
ON SRC.UPC = TGT.UPC
and TGT.RETAILER_CODE <> $Y
group by 1,2,3,4
;
Step 3:
Insert into UPC_COMMON_ID_MAP_W3 (
  UPC,
  RETAILER_CODE,
  ITEM_ID
)
 Select SRC.UPC, SRC.Retailer_code, SRC.ITEM_ID from
(SELECT
    FIELD_9 AS UPC,
    $Y AS RETAILER_CODE,
    FIELD_1 AS ITEM_ID
  FROM $X 
  WHERE FIELD_9 <> 'UPC' AND FIELD_9 IS NOT NULL AND FIELD_9 <> ' ' AND FIELD_9 REGEXP '^[0-9]+$'
 GROUP BY UPC, RETAILER_CODE
) SRC
LEFT JOIN UPC_COMMON_ID_MAP2 TGT
ON SRC.UPC = TGT.UPC
where TGT.UPC is null
;
Step 5:
create table $Z
select
  a.FIELD_1 as ITEM_ID,
  a.FIELD_2 as TITLE,
  a.FIELD_9 as UPC,
  a.FIELD_3 as PRODUCT_URL,
  a.FIELD_4 as IMAGE_URL,
  a.FIELD_3 as AFFILIATE_URL,
  b.common_id as PRICE_ID,
  a.FIELD_13 + ' ' AS PRICE1,
  a.FIELD_5 + ' ' AS PRICE2
from $X a, UPC_COMMON_ID_MAP2 b
where a.FIELD_9 = b.upc
and b.retailer_code = $Y
and a.FIELD_9 <> 'UPC' 
and a.FIELD_9 is not null and a.FIELD_9 REGEXP '^[0-9]+$' 
and a.FIELD_9 <> ' '
and length(a.FIELD_9) < 51
